alert.note: Alert for Cascades in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 01 at 2:19PM PDT until April 03 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM PDT MONDAY ABOVE 1500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow above 1500 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 5 to 12 inches, except 11 to 27 inches above 2500 feet. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Northern Oregon Cascades and Cascades in Lane County. * WHEN...Until 5 AM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Cascades in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascades
